name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
JavaScript Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions, particularly focused on automation within AI workflows. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and crafting seamless integrations with tools such as **n8n**, **UiPath**, **Zapier**, and **Power Automate**. Demonstrated capability in leveraging **crewai** and **autogen** for streamlined automation processes. Skilled in building cloud-native applications and microservices architecture, with extensive use of both **Azure** and **AWS** platforms. Strong background in developing secure and maintainable solutions compliant with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
Able to design and implement solutions that improve efficiency through automation and real-time analytics. Fluent in German, enhancing communication in diverse environments. Passionate about delivering impactful, technically robust systems, with a commitment to professional excellence.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable full-stack solutions utilizing **JavaScript** and **TypeScript**, ensuring robust workflow automation processes with tools such as **n8n**, **Zapier**, and **Power Automate**.  
• Developed AI-driven features in applications, incorporating workflow automation strategies powered by **CrewaI**, **Autogen**, and **UiPath**, to enhance user interactions and backend processes.  
• Built cross-platform mobile applications integrating **JavaScript** frameworks and libraries for both iOS and Android platforms, ensuring streamlined user experiences.  
• Led the transition to microservices while working with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, optimizing system architecture for high availability, achieving up to **99.9%** uptime in service availability.  
• Established cloud data architecture leveraging **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, optimizing data ingestion and querying processes to handle over **1 million** records efficiently.  
• Implemented machine learning solutions integrated with **Python** libraries such as **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, achieving predictive analytics for real-time applications.  
• Developed and deployed MLOps pipelines with **MLflow** and **Apache Airflow**, ensuring the continuous delivery of models across environments, with a version control system managing over **50** active models.  
• Created financial data visualization tools using **D3.js** and **Chart.js**, providing insights into transactional data with **real-time** dashboards and KPIs.  
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams including data scientists to deploy **NLP** models using **spaCy** for document analysis and fraud detection in financial records.  
• Integrated advanced search capabilities with **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch**, improving the search performance by **40%** across millions of records.  
• Developed testing strategies employing **Jest** and **Cypress**, ensuring comprehensive coverage for both frontend and backend systems, enhancing reliability and efficiency.

Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** to lead the development of dynamic, user-focused front-end applications, employing frameworks such as React (18) and Vue 3 for seamless user experiences in financial dashboards and admin portals.
Employed AI workflow automation platforms including **n8n**, **UiPath**, and **Zapier** to enhance operational efficiency and automate repetitive processes, reducing manual effort by **30%**.
Implemented real-time data processing and ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating batch and real-time ingestion of financial data, achieving a throughput of **10,000 transactions/hour**.
Orchestrated advanced analytics dashboards using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations to monitor financial activities in real time and generate insights with a **95% accuracy** rate in anomaly detection.
Integrated asynchronous communication mechanisms via **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, optimizing transaction alerts and compliance workflows for rapid event processing, improving response times by **50%**.
Designed and developed AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems leveraging **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, analyzing over **100,000** transaction patterns to proactively identify and mitigate fraudulent activities in banking systems.
Created and deployed ML pipelines for credit scoring and churn prediction using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, ensuring real-time decision-making and improved customer retention rates.
Implemented automation workflows using **Power Automate** and **CrewaI**, enhancing process efficiency and supporting team productivity enhancements across various projects while maintaining proficient communication in **Fluent German**.

Utilized **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** for developing scalable and maintainable backend services for a complex application, ensuring efficient data processing and integration with third-party tools like **Zapier** and **n8n**.
Implemented AI workflow automation using tools such as **UiPath** and **Power Automate**, streamlining tasks and enhancing operational efficiency across key business processes.
Collaborated on machine learning projects leveraging **LightGBM** and **TensorFlow**, effectively contributing to the automation of AI-driven features and optimizing user experiences based on real-time analytics.
Employed **Fluent German** for effective communication with diverse teams, enhancing collaboration in international projects and promoting a team-first culture.
Enhanced application performance and user engagement through the implementation of **Autogen** and **CrewaI** for dynamic feature improvements and automation of routine processes.
Conducted thorough testing and debugging using **Jest** and **Mocha**, achieving a bug reduction of over **30%** in production environments.
Participated in agile development cycles, contributing to **sprints** that increased project delivery speeds by **20%**, while ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices.
Fostered a culture of continuous improvement by integrating user feedback into development cycles and supporting the transition to modern frameworks like **Vue 3** and **React 18**.
